this_title: Serge Daney : Le Cinéma Et Le Monde
trans_title: 赛尔日·达内：电影与世界
introduction: Serge Daney died twenty years ago, at the age of 48 years. Journalist, traveler, it was a critical thinker and a respected television production scanning, video, and especially passionate cinephile. This documentary recreates the word of Serge Daney on film and filmmakers that collects on Serge Daney.
